subject: [R] Call-Tips
body:
Hi: I am brand new to this group ( and To Tinn-R), so I have my first question: How do I turn on the Call-Tips? I went through the help and I have installed the SciViews but still can't get it to work. I would really appreciate your help.
 
---------------------------------
TV dinner still cooling?

	[[alternative HTML version deleted]]

R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
